Instruction: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and lightly grease a 1 quart baking dish.
Mix together the cereal, milk, sugar, nutmeg, vanilla, eggs, and salt in a large bowl. Pour the mixture into the greased 1-quart baking dish and allow it to sit for 15 minutes.

Line a roasting pan with a damp kitchen towel. Place the baking dish on the towel, inside the roasting pan on the oven rack. Fill the roasting pan with boiling water to reach halfway up the sides of the baking dish. Bake for 40 to 50 minutes until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
